SELECT m.no, m.email, m.nickname, m.regdate, COALESCE(reportCounts.reportcount, 0) AS reportcount, COALESCE(banCounts.bancount, 0) AS bancount FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN (SELECT reportedmemberno, COUNT(*) AS reportcount FROM REPORT GROUP BY reportedmemberno) reportCounts ON m.no = reportCounts.reportedmemberno LEFT JOIN (SELECT memberno, COUNT(*) AS bancount FROM BAN GROUP BY memberno) banCounts ON m.no = banCounts.memberno
WHERE m.seller = 0 GROUP BY m.no, m.email, m.nickname, m.regdate HAVING reportcount > 0;

SELECT m.no, m.email, m.nickname, m.regdate, COALESCE(reportCounts.reportcount, 0) AS reportcount, COALESCE(banCounts.bancount, 0) AS bancount FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN (SELECT reportedmemberno, COUNT(*) AS reportcount FROM REPORT GROUP BY reportedmemberno) reportCounts ON m.no = reportCounts.reportedmemberno LEFT JOIN (SELECT memberno, COUNT(*) AS bancount FROM BAN GROUP BY memberno) banCounts ON m.no = banCounts.memberno
WHERE m.seller = 1 GROUP BY m.no, m.email, m.nickname, m.regdate HAVING reportcount > 0;
